Package clientside.client

Interface Client

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ClientMethod
    public interface Client
    The interface that represents a Client of the Pentago game!

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.lang.String getClientName()
      This method is used to access the client's name!
      Game getGame()
      This method is used to access the game object used by a client when in a game of pentago!
      java.io.PrintWriter getPwGame()
      This method is used to access the PrintWriter object that is used in the game!
      java.io.PrintWriter getPwGameNet()
      This method is used to access another PrintWriter object that is used in the game!
      java.lang.String[] getSupportedExtensions()
      This method is used to access the supported extensions of the server the client is connected to!
      java.lang.String getUsername()
      This method is used to access the client's username in the game!
      boolean newGame​(java.lang.String player1, java.lang.String player2)
      This method gives a boolean value depending on whether the 2 players passed as the parameter can get in a game or not!
      void start()
      The method used to start the client thread.

    • Method Detail

      • newGame

        boolean newGame​(java.lang.String player1,
                java.lang.String player2)
        This method gives a boolean value depending on whether the 2 players passed as the parameter can get in a game or not!
        Parameters:
        player1 - - The first player who is going to be in the game!
        player2 - - The second player of the game!
        Returns:
        true if the players can get in a game and false if an error happened.

      • getPwGame

        java.io.PrintWriter getPwGame()
        This method is used to access the PrintWriter object that is used in the game!
        Returns:
        A printWriter object used in game.

      • getPwGameNet

        java.io.PrintWriter getPwGameNet()
        This method is used to access another PrintWriter object that is used in the game!
        Returns:
        A printWriter object used in game.

      • getGame

        Game getGame()
        This method is used to access the game object used by a client when in a game of pentago!
        Returns:
        The game object when a client is in a game.

      • getClientName

        java.lang.String getClientName()
        This method is used to access the client's name!
        Returns:
        The string representing the client's name.

      • getUsername

        java.lang.String getUsername()
        This method is used to access the client's username in the game!
        Returns:
        The string representing the client's username.

      • getSupportedExtensions

        java.lang.String[] getSupportedExtensions()
        This method is used to access the supported extensions of the server the client is connected to!
        Returns:
        The string[] representing all the extensions the server supports

      • start

        void start()
        The method used to start the client thread. When this method is called, a new thread of the client class will be created
